00019 /** \file
00020   \brief Tools to open the sim port
00021 */
00022 
00023 #ifndef __SOCKETSIMPORT_H
00024 #define __SOCKETSIMPORT_H
00025 
00026 #ifdef HAVE_SOCKET
00027 
00028 #include <sys/types.h>
00029 #include <sys/socket.h>
00030 #include <netinet/in.h>
00031 #include <termios.h>
00032 #include <fcntl.h>
00033 
00034 #include "simport.h"
00035 #include "fdsimport.h"
00036 
00037 /// Base class for virtual ports
00038 class SocketSimPort : public FDSimPort {
00039 public:
00040     /// Constructor
00041     SocketSimPort(int port);
00042 
00043     /// Destructor
00044     virtual ~SocketSimPort();
00045 
00046 protected:
00047     /// Wait for a connection
00048     virtual int tryConnection();
00049 
00050     /// Close the current actively connected socket
00051     virtual void closeCurrentConnection();
00052 
00053     /// Two locations
00054     struct sockaddr_in loc_addr, rem_addr;
00055 
00056     /// The actual socket
00057     int s;
00058 
00059     /// The port number
00060     int portno;
00061 };
00062 
00063 #endif //  HAVE_SOCKET
00064 
00065 #endif //__SOCKETSIMPORT_H
